content: I'm in Urbana Champlain at the UofI. @DerekD and I dabble in Lean regularly. Not sure if there are others here that are working with mathlib. Would love to meet up!
I am moving there in July! My wife is starting as a new assistant professor at U of I
Hi Brandon. That's great. I'm thrilled to have another Lean user in our small community. Feel free to reach out should you or your wife need anything when you reach Urbana Champaign.
